channel.title: Find people to play with!
channel.description: People looking to join / add / find / connect, let's go !

item.title: New heavy noise project looking for a bassist!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Andy Webber)
item.dc:creator: Andy Webber
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,

I'm playing drums in a new project with my friend Cassidy on guitar. We've got a few songs mostly roughed out and we are seeking a bassist. I always struggle to describe genres. He called it New Wave Death Blues, which isn't entirely accurate, but I don't have a better idea. He's into extreme metal and angular dissonant things, as well as Primus and other 90's stuff, and he is a very talented player. I like to hang out in the pocket and just play rock'n'roll, but my writing...

Read more

item.title: Local folk show
item.author: invalid@example.com (ethan_locrian_opce)
item.dc:creator: ethan_locrian_opce
item.content:encoded: Hey all! I'm gearing up to release my first single as a solo artist, and I wanted to play some shows to get traction. I make singer-songwriter folk music, but most of my connections are in the hardcore and rave scenes. Any advice you can give me on finding folk shows/venues would be greatly appreciated, and if anybody is looking to fill a slot with a folk performance, that would be even better!

item.title: PETER M : Drummer : I want to be a back up drummer
item.author: invalid@example.com (PETER M)
item.dc:creator: PETER M
item.content:encoded:
Howdy,

My name is Peter. I sing and play keys and guitar in we are the willows. I also drummed on our newest record.

I started playing music as a drummer and it’s still one of my favorite things to do. I’d like to play more.

This is subject to change but it’s safe to say I can play 1 show a month and can generally be available for 2-3 rehearsals before a show. My day rate is $150 (just for the performance. No charge for rehearsals). I’m probably not reliable as a main drummer but...

Read more

item.title: Looking to join a Group
item.author: invalid@example.com (thisjaiden)
item.dc:creator: thisjaiden
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm Sophie!
I've been doing music most of my life, hopping from ensemble to ensemble, casual group to school band, instrument to instrument. I'd like to join a group and really get into the local scene. Enough drifting around!

I've done lots of things in the past. You can see how I'd rate myself currently on any of those things here, on my user profile. I'll update there if I'm not available or my skills change. You can also find a couple good ways to contact me there...

Read more

item.title: Stone Ark - Seeking Rhythm/Lead Hybrid Guitar Player
item.author: invalid@example.com (JBiehns)
item.dc:creator: JBiehns
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

My band Stone Ark is looking for a guitar player with strong rhythm and lead guitar skills that wants to join as a core member of the group. We actively gig about twice a month, often more during the summer, with rehearsal at least once a week on the weekends.

If you or someone you know is interested, please reach out to me by email at stoneark22@gmail.com, or by phone at 763.352.4656.

Here are two music videos we have out right now to get a feel for our music and style...

Read more

item.title: Oceanographer Seeks Bassist!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Oceanographer)
item.dc:creator: Oceanographer
item.content:encoded:
Hi! We are looking for a bassist--queer bipoc to the front pls~! We are a nonbinary/femme and latine-led band. Everyone is welcome; we do 1-2 shows a month and ~1 practice a week. You will get equal splits at each show, equal merch cut, and we can negotiate contracts/pay for recording.

Deep Sea Diver

DEEP SEA DIVER is Oceanographer's debut EP. It is described as a "queer yearning" record; tender, hopeful, and intimate. The soundscape twinkles with reverb and chorus, painting the image of a small M
on.soundcloud.com


Here's da music^^

item.title: Oceanographer Band Seeks Drummer!!! Femme Queer Latine Led Band!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Oceanographer)
item.dc:creator: Oceanographer
item.content:encoded: Hi! My semi-established band is seeking a new permanent drummer. Preference goes to femmes and queer folk, but anyone who is chill, kind, communicative, and able to commit to once a week practice is welcome! We are aiming for 1-2 shows a month at most and doing some recording/social media stuff here and there!

item.title: Dogpark show 3/22
item.author: invalid@example.com (ethan_locrian_opce)
item.dc:creator: ethan_locrian_opce
item.content:encoded:
Hey TCUP! O-PCE is working on organizing a benefit show for TCTMA, and we're looking for a few more acts! If anyone is available to play some noisy rave music on March 22nd, please hit us up on Instagram @o_pce_the_djs

Attached is a draft of the show poster to get a sense of the vibe !!!

item.title: Guitar/Synth/Bass for Hire
item.author: invalid@example.com (ross.clowser)
item.dc:creator: ross.clowser
item.content:encoded:
Hiya!

Though my own work is more experimental, I'm really good as a side person and collaborator. When I lived in Iowa, I played pretty consistently in bands with rappers, singers, poets, and everything in between. I can learn music fast, read, improvise, and do some production stuff. I have done some remote recording.

I contributed recently to this recording (which isn't out yet, so don't share

Listen to We Go by Ion Alexakis on #SoundCloud...

Read more

Got this going! @nadi @trish

'Find people to play with' sounds kinda weird but I'm working on it.
